title: A Terrifying Tackle
description:
Michael Wilbon and Frank Isola discuss their thoughts on Tua’s head and neck injury in last nights Dolphins/Bengals game, if the MVP vote should be close between Ohtani and Judge and who should be favored in the upcoming Mets/Braves series. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
